Config.maxVoltageTip: Absolute maximum value that will be visible on y-axis.
Config.signalNameTip:
Name that you will see in plot's legend.
One of the signals should be named 'ADC' to observe its real time value.
Order is important!
Preferred length: 10 characters.
Config.signalsNumberTip: The number of signals that you want to observe on the plot.
Config.updateTimeTip:
Interval between reading input data packets. Also used to update plot's view.
Should be less or equal to interval that used on a micro controller to send data!
Preferred value: from 1 to 99.

LabBox.csvPathLineEditTip:
Path to directory where CSV's will be saved.
 Optional, leave empty for no log.
